20110125020259.000|20110125020300.000|CC1|THE FERRIS WHEEL, THE BOWLING   
20110125020300.000|20110125020302.000|CC1|TOURNAMENT, AND MOST OBVIOUSLY  
20110125020302.000|20110125020308.000|CC1|THE STEEL-FRAME SKYSCRAPER.     
20110125020308.000|20110125020310.000|CC1|CHICAGO'S SKYSCRAPERS ROSE FROM 
20110125020310.000|20110125020312.000|CC1|THE ASHES OF A GREAT FIRE IN    
20110125020312.000|20110125020315.000|CC1|1871 WHICH RAZED THE ENTIRE CITY
20110125020315.000|20110125020317.000|CC1|TO THE GROUND.                  
20110125020317.000|20110125020319.000|CC1|ENTER VISIONARY ARCHITECT       
20110125020319.000|20110125020320.000|CC1|WILLIAM LE BARON JENNY WHO      
20110125020320.000|20110125020322.000|CC1|DREAMT UP GIANT STRUCTURES OF   
20110125020322.000|20110125020324.000|CC1|STEEL AND GLASS AND CREATED THE 
20110125020324.000|20110125020328.000|CC1|WORLD'S FIRST SKYSCRAPER.       
20110125020328.000|20110125020330.000|CC1|THIS IS THE MONADNOCK BUILDING, 
20110125020330.000|20110125020332.000|CC1|BUT IN 1891, JUST 20 YEARS AFTER
20110125020332.000|20110125020333.000|CC1|THE CITY WAS BURNED TO THE      
20110125020333.000|20110125020335.000|CC1|GROUND, THIS WAS THE TALLEST    
20110125020335.000|20110125020337.000|CC1|BUILDING IN THE WORLD.          
20110125020337.000|20110125020338.000|CC1|AT THE TIME, MOST OF THE        
20110125020338.000|20110125020339.000|CC1|BUILDINGS AROUND HERE WERE 5    
20110125020339.000|20110125020341.000|CC1|STORIES TALL, SO WHEN THIS THING
20110125020341.000|20110125020350.000|CC1|WENT UP, PEOPLE WERE AMAZED.    
20110125020350.000|20110125020352.000|CC1|THIS IS CALLED A SEGWAY.        
20110125020352.000|20110125020354.000|CC1|IT'S REALLY REALLY FUN, AND IT'S
20110125020354.000|20110125020356.000|CC1|EASY TO USE.                    
20110125020356.000|20110125020357.000|CC1|THE SEGWAY IS A 2-WHEELED       
20110125020357.000|20110125020358.000|CC1|ELECTRIC SCOOTER THAT CAN BE    
20110125020358.000|20110125020402.000|CC1|USED ON ROADS AND SIDEWALKS.    
20110125020402.000|20110125020403.000|CC1|AND THIS IS THE EARLIEST        
20110125020403.000|20110125020404.000|CC1|ARCHITECTURAL EXPERIMENT BUILT  
20110125020404.000|20110125020407.000|CC1|IN 1891, JENNY'S MANHATTAN      
20110125020407.000|20110125020411.000|CC1|BUILDING.                       
20110125020411.000|20110125020412.000|CC1|>> IT'S THIS WHOLE SERIES OF ALL
20110125020412.000|20110125020414.000|CC1|OF THESE VERTICAL FLOORS STACKED
20110125020414.000|20110125020416.000|CC1|ON TOP OF EACH OTHER, SO AT THE 
20110125020416.000|20110125020417.000|CC1|BASE, WE HAVE THIS KIND OF      
20110125020417.000|20110125020419.000|CC1|GLASSED OPEN-END AREA FOR SHOPS,
20110125020419.000|20110125020421.000|CC1|BUSINESSES.                     
20110125020421.000|20110125020422.000|CC1|THEN WE'VE GOT THESE 2 FLOORS OF
20110125020422.000|20110125020423.000|CC1|THIS REALLY HEAVY GRANITE, AND  
20110125020423.000|20110125020425.000|CC1|IT ALMOST LOOKS LIKE IT'S GONNA 
20110125020425.000|20110125020426.000|CC1|CAVE DOWN INTO THOSE GLASS      
20110125020426.000|20110125020427.000|CC1|FLOORS THERE.                   
20110125020427.000|20110125020429.000|CC1|THEN WE'VE GOT 6 FLOORS OF THIS 
20110125020429.000|20110125020432.000|CC1|BEAUTIFUL PRESSED BRICK, YEAH   
20110125020432.000|20110125020433.000|CC1|WITH ALL THE ROUND BAY WINDOWS  
20110125020433.000|20110125020434.000|CC1|THAT YOU SEE THERE.             
20110125020434.000|20110125020436.000|CC1|AND ALL THOSE TERRA COTTA       
20110125020436.000|20110125020437.000|CC1|DETAILS: THE FLOWERS AND THE    
20110125020437.000|20110125020439.000|CC1|FACES AND ALL OF THESE--        
20110125020439.000|20110125020447.000|CC1|>> OK.                          
20110125020447.000|20110125020449.000|CC1|THIS IS IT: THE SKYSCRAPER OF   
20110125020449.000|20110125020452.000|CC1|SKYSCRAPERS, THE SEARS TOWER.   
20110125020452.000|20110125020454.000|CC1|BUILT IN 1973, STANDING AT A    
20110125020454.000|20110125020459.000|CC1|STAGGERING 1,454 FEET, 110

20110125020633.000|20110125020633.000|CC1|BEHIND THAT.                    
20110125020633.000|20110125020637.000|CC1|FROM 1890-1920, 2.5 MILLION

20110125020748.000|20110125020752.000|CC1|JOINTS.                         
20110125020752.000|20110125020753.000|CC1|>> HI, PITS, HOW YOU DOING?     
20110125020753.000|20110125020755.000|CC1|I'M SOUTH SIDE.

20110125020758.000|20110125020758.000|CC1|>> JUSTINE.                     
20110125020758.000|20110125020759.000|CC1|>> JUSTINE.                     
20110125020759.000|20110125020800.000|CC1|>> NICE TO MEET YOU.            
20110125020800.000|20110125020801.000|CC1|>> WE'RE GONNA TALK ABOUT AL    
20110125020801.000|20110125020802.000|CC1|CAPONE TODAY.                   
20110125020802.000|20110125020803.000|CC1|MY WHEEL MAN IS LEFTY, AND MY   
20110125020803.000|20110125020804.000|CC1|PARTNER IS AL DENTE.            
20110125020804.000|20110125020806.000|CC1|>> AL DENTE?                    
20110125020806.000|20110125020807.000|CC1|>> HA HA.                       
20110125020807.000|20110125020808.000|CC1|JUST RIGHT.                     
20110125020808.000|20110125020809.000|CC1|HEY, I'LL TELL WHAT, LEFTY, PUT 
20110125020809.000|20110125020815.000|CC1|AN EGG IN YOUR SHOE AND BEAT IT.
20110125020815.000|20110125020816.000|CC1|>> WHERE DID AL CAPONE COME     
20110125020816.000|20110125020817.000|CC1|FROM?                           
20110125020817.000|20110125020818.000|CC1|>> AL WAS BORN IN BROOKLYN,     
20110125020818.000|20110125020819.000|CC1|NEW YORK, SO HE WAS ACTUALLY AN 
20110125020819.000|20110125020820.000|CC1|AMERICAN.                       
20110125020820.000|20110125020821.000|CC1|>> SO WHY DID HE COME TO        
20110125020821.000|20110125020822.000|CC1|CHICAGO?                        
20110125020822.000|20110125020823.000|CC1|>> HE WAS AVOIDING THAT MURDER  
20110125020823.000|20110125020824.000|CC1|RAP, YOU KNOW.                  
20110125020824.000|20110125020825.000|CC1|HE HAD KILLED A FELLOW, AN IRISH
20110125020825.000|20110125020827.000|CC1|GUY, IN BROOKLYN, NEW YORK.     
20110125020827.000|20110125020828.000|CC1|>> YEAH, IT WAS A BUM RAP,      
20110125020828.000|20110125020828.000|CC1|THOUGH.                         
20110125020828.000|20110125020829.000|CC1|IT WAS ATTEMPTED MURDER.        
20110125020829.000|20110125020830.000|CC1|IF HE WANTED TO MURDER THE GUY, 
20110125020830.000|20110125020831.000|CC1|THE GUY'D HAD BEEN MURDERED, AND
20110125020831.000|20110125020832.000|CC1|ONCE HE WAS DEAD, HE WOULD'VE   
20110125020832.000|20110125020833.000|CC1|STAYED DEAD.                    
20110125020833.000|20110125020834.000|CC1|>> ENDED UP MEETING A FELLOW    
20110125020834.000|20110125020837.000|CC1|NAMED JOHNNY "THE FOX" TORIO.   
20110125020837.000|20110125020838.000|CC1|THIS WAS THE VERY FIRST PLACE   
20110125020838.000|20110125020840.000|CC1|THAT AL CAPONE WORKED.          
20110125020840.000|20110125020841.000|CC1|THIS WAS THE FAMOUS CLUB THE 4  
20110125020841.000|20110125020842.000|CC1|DEUCES.                         
20110125020842.000|20110125020844.000|CC1|AND HAD THE ADDRESS OF 2222     
20110125020844.000|20110125020846.000|CC1|SOUTH WALBASH, SO LIKE A HAND OF
20110125020846.000|20110125020848.000|CC1|CARDS, THEY CALLED IT THE 4     
20110125020848.000|20110125020850.000|CC1|DEUCES CLUB.                    
20110125020850.000|20110125020851.000|CC1|AND AL'S JOB ORIGINALLY HERE WAS
20110125020851.000|20110125020853.000|CC1|TO STAND HERE AS A ROPER ROPING 
20110125020853.000|20110125020855.000|CC1|GUYS INTO THE PLACE.            
20110125020855.000|20110125020855.000|CC1|"COME ON IN.                    
20110125020855.000|20110125020856.000|CC1|COME ON IN.                     
20110125020856.000|20110125020858.000|CC1|HEY, YOU, OVER HERE, OVER HERE."
20110125020858.000|20110125020859.000|CC1|THE WHOLE FIRST FLOOR WAS A BAR,
20110125020859.000|20110125020901.000|CC1|THE SECOND FLOOR WAS GAMBLING,  
20110125020901.000|20110125020902.000|CC1|AND THE THIRD AND THE FOURTH    
20110125020902.000|20110125020903.000|CC1|FLOOR WAS GIRLS.                
20110125020903.000|20110125020904.000|CC1|>> GIRLS?                       
20110125020904.000|20110125020905.000|CC1|OH, I KNOW WHAT YOU'RE SAYING.  
20110125020905.000|20110125020906.000|CC1|YEAH, YEAH.                     
20110125020906.000|20110125020907.000|CC1|NICE GIRLS.                     
20110125020907.000|20110125020908.000|CC1|>> HE WAS ONLY MAKING 25 BUCKS A
20110125020908.000|20110125020909.000|CC1|WEEK RIGHT NOW.                 
20110125020909.000|20110125020910.000|CC1|REMEMBER, HE JUST WAS STARTING  
20110125020910.000|20110125020911.000|CC1|OUT.                            
20110125020911.000|20110125020912.000|CC1|>> WHICH AIN'T BAD MONEY IN THE 
20110125020912.000|20110125020913.000|CC1|1920s, BUT YOU AIN'T GONNA GET  
20110125020913.000|20110125020918.000|CC1|RICH OFF OF IT.                 
20110125020918.000|20110125020919.000|CC1|HIT IT, LEFTY.                  
20110125020919.000|20110125020921.000|CC1|>> HOW DID AL CAPONE BECOME TOP 
20110125020921.000|20110125020923.000|CC1|DOG?                            
20110125020923.000|20110125020925.000|CC1|>> MURDER.                      
20110125020925.000|20110125020927.000|CC1|HE AND JOHNNY "THE FOX" TORIO,  
20110125020927.000|20110125020930.000|CC1|MOST PEOPLE AGREE PROBABLY SET  
20110125020930.000|20110125020931.000|CC1|UP A HIT ALONG WITH PERHAPS     
20110125020931.000|20110125020934.000|CC1|COLISEMO'S WIFE TO HAVE BIG JIM 
20110125020934.000|20110125020935.000|CC1|COLISEMO KNOCKED OUT OF THE     
20110125020935.000|20110125020936.000|CC1|BALLGAME.                       
20110125020936.000|20110125020937.000|CC1|ONCE COLISEMO WAS OUT OF THE    
20110125020937.000|20110125020939.000|CC1|WAY, ALL THE MONEY WAS WIDE OPEN
20110125020939.000|20110125020942.000|CC1|TO THEM.                        
20110125020942.000|20110125020943.000|CC1|AL GETS A PERMIT TO GO AHEAD    
20110125020943.000|20110125020945.000|CC1|FROM THE US GOVERNMENT AND TO   
20110125020945.000|20110125020948.000|CC1|START PRODUCING A MALTINE ALE.  
20110125020948.000|20110125020949.000|CC1|THIS WAS BEER WITH THE ALCOHOL  
20110125020949.000|20110125020950.000|CC1|BOILED OFF--TECHNICALLY ALL     
20110125020950.000|20110125020952.000|CC1|STREET LEGAL.                   
20110125020952.000|20110125020953.000|CC1|THEY WOULD PRODUCE THE BEER     
20110125020953.000|20110125020955.000|CC1|HERE, PUT IT INTO BARRELS, AND  
20110125020955.000|20110125020956.000|CC1|SHIP IT ALL THE WAY ACROSS      
20110125020956.000|20110125020958.000|CC1|CHICAGO TO ALL OF AL'S ILLEGAL  
20110125020958.000|20110125021000.000|CC1|SPEAKEASIES.                    
20110125021000.000|20110125021001.000|CC1|ONCE THEY GOT IT INSIDE THE     
20110125021001.000|20110125021004.000|CC1|PLACE, THEY GUYS WOULD COME WITH
20110125021004.000|20110125021006.000|CC1|VETERINARIAN SYRINGES--LITERALLY
20110125021006.000|20110125021008.000|CC1|FILLED WITH 180-PROOF PURE

20110125021009.000|20110125021011.000|CC1|BUNG, THE CENTER CORK OF THE

20110125021012.000|20110125021014.000|CC1|TO GIVE IT THE PUNCH THE GUYS

20110125021553.000|20110125021554.000|CC1|>> LITTLE BIT OF A LIME FLAVOR  
20110125021554.000|20110125021555.000|CC1|TO IT, YEAH.                    
20110125021555.000|20110125021556.000|CC1|>> THEY'RE DELICIOUS WHEN YOU   
20110125021556.000|20110125021557.000|CC1|TASTE THEM AN HOUR LATER DOWN   
20110125021557.000|20110125021559.000|CC1|THE ROAD.                       
20110125021559.000|20110125021602.000|CC1|[LAUGHING]                      
20110125021602.000|20110125021604.000|CC1|>> IT'S ONE OF THE THINGS YOU   
20110125021604.000|20110125021606.000|CC1|SHOULD GO AS A TRAVELER, AND I

20110125021609.000|20110125021612.000|CC1|ATTRACTS, I GUESS, EUROPEANS.

20110125021616.000|20110125021617.000|CC1|IT ALL.

20110125021810.000|20110125021812.000|CC1|SPRINGFIELD HAS BEEN THE CAPITAL
20110125021812.000|20110125021814.000|CC1|OF ILLINOIS SINCE 1837.         
20110125021814.000|20110125021815.000|CC1|IT HAS A MERE POPULATION OF     
20110125021815.000|20110125021817.000|CC1|109,000 PEOPLE ALTHOUGH ONE     
20110125021817.000|20110125021819.000|CC1|MILLION VISITORS DESCEND UPON IT
20110125021819.000|20110125021821.000|CC1|THROUGHOUT THE YEAR, AND THAT'S 
20110125021821.000|20110125021822.000|CC1|BECAUSE IT'S THE HOME OF THE    
20110125021822.000|20110125021824.000|CC1|16th PRESIDENT OF THE UNITED    
20110125021824.000|20110125021826.000|CC1|STATES OF AMERICA, ABRAHAM      
20110125021826.000|20110125021828.000|CC1|LINCOLN.                        
20110125021828.000|20110125021830.000|CC1|LINCOLN STUDIED LAW AND POLITICS
20110125021830.000|20110125021833.000|CC1|HERE BETWEEN 1837 AND 1861.     
20110125021833.000|20110125021835.000|CC1|HE WORKED OUT OF THE HERNDON LAW
20110125021835.000|20110125021836.000|CC1|OFFICES, AND IT IS HERE THAT HE 
20110125021836.000|20110125021838.000|CC1|WROTE HIS FIRST INAUGURAL       
20110125021838.000|20110125021840.000|CC1|ADDRESS AS PRESIDENT OF THE     
20110125021840.000|20110125021842.000|CC1|UNITED STATES.                  
20110125021842.000|20110125021843.000|CC1|PRESIDENT ABRAHAM LINCOLN IS ONE
20110125021843.000|20110125021844.000|CC1|OF THE BEST-LOVED AMERICAN

20110125021849.000|20110125021850.000|CC1|IT'S NOT EVERYDAY YOU GET TO    
20110125021850.000|20110125021851.000|CC1|MEET A PRESIDENT, SO I'VE       
20110125021851.000|20110125021853.000|CC1|DRESSED A BIT SMART.            
20110125021853.000|20110125021854.000|CC1|WHAT'S GREAT ABOUT LINCOLN IS HE
20110125021854.000|20110125021856.000|CC1|PROVED THE AMERICAN DREAM--     
20110125021856.000|20110125021857.000|CC1|THAT ANYBODY CAN BECOME

20110125022149.000|20110125022151.000|CC1|>> BESIDES RIDE IN A PETTY CAB? 
20110125022151.000|20110125022152.000|CC1|>> UH-HUH.                      
20110125022152.000|20110125022153.000|CC1|ABRAHAM LINCOLN BOARDED THE     
20110125022153.000|20110125022155.000|CC1|TRAIN FOR WASHINGTON, D.C.      
20110125022155.000|20110125022157.000|CC1|ON FEBRUARY 11, 1861.           
20110125022157.000|20110125022159.000|CC1|IN HIS FAREWELL SPEECH TO THE   
20110125022159.000|20110125022200.000|CC1|CITIZENS OF SPRINGFIELD, HE     
20110125022200.000|20110125022202.000|CC1|PROMISED TO RETURN--AND HE NEVER
20110125022202.000|20110125022204.000|CC1|DID.                            
20110125022204.000|20110125022206.000|CC1|>> ... IN MY SITUATION COULD    
20110125022206.000|20110125022208.000|CC1|APPRECIATE MY FEELING OF        
20110125022208.000|20110125022210.000|CC1|SADNESS AT THIS PARTING.        
20110125022210.000|20110125022213.000|CC1|I NOW LEAVE NOT KNOWING WHEN OR 
20110125022213.000|20110125022215.000|CC1|WHETHER EVER I MAY RETURN WITH A
20110125022215.000|20110125022217.000|CC1|TASK BEFORE ME GREATER THAN THAT
20110125022217.000|20110125022221.000|CC1|WHICH RESTED UPON...            
20110125022221.000|20110125022223.000|CC1|>> DURING HIS FIRST TERM AS     
20110125022223.000|20110125022224.000|CC1|PRESIDENT, ABRAHAM LINCOLN      
20110125022224.000|20110125022225.000|CC1|PASSED THE EMANCIPATION         
20110125022225.000|20110125022227.000|CC1|PROCLAMATION FREEING THE SLAVES,
20110125022227.000|20110125022229.000|CC1|BUT THIS UPSET A LOT OF PEOPLE, 
20110125022229.000|20110125022230.000|CC1|AND INDEED HIS WORST NIGHTMARE  
20110125022230.000|20110125022231.000|CC1|CAME TRUE.                      
20110125022231.000|20110125022234.000|CC1|ON APRIL 14, 1865, PRESIDENT    
20110125022234.000|20110125022235.000|CC1|ABRAHAM LINCOLN WAS ASSASSINATED
20110125022235.000|20110125022237.000|CC1|SHORTLY AFTER BEING ELECTED TO A
20110125022237.000|20110125022238.000|CC1|SECOND TERM.                    
20110125022238.000|20110125022241.000|CC1|HE WAS ASSASSINATED BY AN ACTOR,
20110125022241.000|20110125022245.000|CC1|JOHN WILKES BOOTH.              
20110125022245.000|20110125022247.000|CC1|HE WAS BURIED RIGHT HERE.       
20110125022247.000|20110125022248.000|CC1|OAK RIDGE CEMETERY IS THE SECOND
20110125022248.000|20110125022249.000|CC1|MOST-VISITED CEMETERY IN THE    
20110125022249.000|20110125022251.000|CC1|UNITED STATES.                  
20110125022251.000|20110125022252.000|CC1|A MILLION PEOPLE A YEAR COME TO 
20110125022252.000|20110125022253.000|CC1|SPRINGFIELD TO PAY HOMAGE TO    
20110125022253.000|20110125022255.000|CC1|PRESIDENT ABRAHAM LINCOLN.      
20110125022255.000|20110125022305.000|CC1|THAT'S FOR GOOD LUCK.           
20110125022305.000|20110125022307.000|CC1|THE TOMB WAS COMPLETED IN 1874  
20110125022307.000|20110125022309.000|CC1|AND WAS FUNDED BY PUBLIC        
20110125022309.000|20110125022310.000|CC1|DONATIONS.                      
20110125022310.000|20110125022312.000|CC1|THE BRONZE STATUES WERE BUILT BY
20110125022312.000|20110125022313.000|CC1|RENOWNED VERMONT SCULPTOR       
20110125022313.000|20110125022315.000|CC1|LARKIN MEAD.                    
20110125022315.000|20110125022317.000|CC1|ABRAHAM LINCOLN, HIS WIFE MARY, 
20110125022317.000|20110125022318.000|CC1|AND 3 OF HIS 4 SONS ARE BURIED  
20110125022318.000|20110125022325.000|CC1|HERE.                           
20110125022325.000|20110125022327.000|CC1|I NOW FLY 600 MILES TO          
20110125022327.000|20110125022329.000|CC1|CLEVELAND, OHIO.                
20110125022329.000|20110125022330.000|CC1|IT'S BORDERED BY LAKE ERIE AND  
20110125022330.000|20110125022332.000|CC1|PORTIONS OF MICHIGAN AND INDIANA
20110125022332.000|20110125022334.000|CC1|IN THE WEST.                    
20110125022334.000|20110125022337.000|CC1|I MAKE MY JOURNEY ACROSS ROLLING
20110125022337.000|20110125022338.000|CC1|HILLS INTO HOLMES COUNTY AND THE
20110125022338.000|20110125022340.000|CC1|VILLAGE OF BERLIN, ADOPTED HOME 
20110125022340.000|20110125022348.000|CC1|OF THE AMISH COMMUNITY.         
20110125022348.000|20110125022349.000|CC1|THE AMISH ARE A GROUP OF        
20110125022349.000|20110125022351.000|CC1|DISSENTING CHRISTIANS WHO GREW  
20110125022351.000|20110125022352.000|CC1|OUT OF THE ANABAPTIST MOVEMENT  
20110125022352.000|20110125022355.000|CC1|OF GERMANY AND SWITZERLAND.     
20110125022355.000|20110125022357.000|CC1|PERSECUTED BY CHURCH AND STATE, 
20110125022357.000|20110125022358.000|CC1|THEY CAME TO THE NEW WORLD IN   
20110125022358.000|20110125022401.000|CC1|1720 IN ORDER TO MAINTAIN THEIR 
20110125022401.000|20110125022404.000|CC1|SIMPLE AND DEVOUT LIVES.        
20110125022404.000|20110125022406.000|CC1|THERE ARE 125,000 AMISH IN NORTH
20110125022406.000|20110125022408.000|CC1|AMERICA TODAY.                  
20110125022408.000|20110125022409.000|CC1|THEY SHUN MODERN CONVENIENCES,  
20110125022409.000|20110125022411.000|CC1|DRESS PLAINLY, AND RELY ON      
20110125022411.000|20110125022413.000|CC1|FARMING AND FURNITURE MAKING TO 
20110125022413.000|20110125022426.000|CC1|MAKE THEIR LIVING.              
20110125022426.000|20110125022428.000|CC1|I'M IN THE HEART OF THE AMISH   
20110125022428.000|20110125022431.000|CC1|COMMUNITY, AND--BUT YOU'RE NOT  
20110125022431.000|20110125022433.000|CC1|SUPPOSED TO FILM THE AMISH,     
20110125022433.000|20110125022434.000|CC1|RIGHT.                          
20110125022434.000|20110125022435.000|CC1|IS THAT TRUE?                   
20110125022435.000|20110125022436.000|CC1|WE'RE NOT SUPPOSED TO FILM AMISH
20110125022436.000|20110125022437.000|CC1|PEOPLE.                         
20110125022437.000|20110125022438.000|CC1|>> NO.                          
20110125022438.000|20110125022439.000|CC1|>> AND YOU'RE AN AMISH PERSON.  
20110125022439.000|20110125022440.000|CC1|SO WE SHOULDN'T BE FILMING YOU. 
20110125022440.000|20110125022441.000|CC1|RIGHT.                          
20110125022441.000|20110125022442.000|CC1|OK, SO NO FILMING.              
20110125022442.000|20110125022443.000|CC1|NONE OF THAT.                   
20110125022443.000|20110125022444.000|CC1|SO I'LL BE SEEING LOTS OF THEM,

20110125022503.000|20110125022505.000|CC1|OPPORTUNITY BECAUSE THE AMISH

20110125022610.000|20110125022611.000|CC1|THE AMISH.

20110125022616.000|20110125022617.000|CC1|>> LOOK AT THAT.

20110125022619.000|20110125022620.000|CC1|HELLO?

20110125022637.000|20110125022638.000|CC1|>> THE WOODWORK HAS BEEN ALL--  
20110125022638.000|20110125022640.000|CC1|GOES ALL THE WAY BACK INTO THE

20110125022648.000|20110125022650.000|CC1|IT'S A CULTURE.

20110125022652.000|20110125022653.000|CC1|A LOT OF PEOPLE THINK THIS AMISH
